name: buildings
summary: Extract building footprints with height estimation
description:
The buildings command extracts all building polygons from an OSM file with associated metadata including:

- Building type (residential, commercial, etc.)
- Height (explicit or estimated from levels)
- Number of levels/floors
- Roof type and material
- Address information

Height is estimated from building:levels tags when not explicitly set, using a configurable meters-per-floor value.

options.--type: Filter by building type (e.g., residential, commercial)

output:
GeoJSON with properties:
- id: OSM way ID
- building: Building type
- height: Height in meters (actual or estimated)
- levels: Number of floors
- name: Building name if tagged
- address: Full address if available
